original_text: (Og king of Bashan was the last of the Rephaites. His bed was decorated with iron and was more than nine cubits long and four cubits wide. It is still in Rabbah of the Ammonites.)
korean_text: (르바임 족속의 남은 자는 바산 왕 옥뿐이었으며 그의 침상은 철 침상이라 아직도 암몬 족속의 랍바에 있지 아니하냐 그것을 사람의 보통 규빗으로 재면 그 길이가 아홉 규빗이요 너비가 네 규빗이니라)

sentences.original_text: was the last of the Rephaites
His bed was decorated with iron
and was more than nine cubits long
It is still in Rabbah of the Ammonites
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 지금도 암몬 사람의 랍바에 있다
